summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of the UI color scheme update to greenish-blue teal and spacing refinements. All requirements appear to be implemented with OKLCH color system (hue 180) in index.css, consistent teal borders (border-2 border-primary/20) across cards, and enhanced spacing throughout components. No evidence of functionality testing or verification is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that all existing functionality continues to work correctly after the UI color and spacing changes
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only UI implementation changes (CSS, component styling). No test files, verification scripts, or evidence of functional testing for authentication, portal navigation, emergency SOS, symptom checker, medical report analysis, admin/doctor dashboards, case management, or doctor management features.
